short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring order to tab chaos by grouping similar tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring order to tab chaos by reordering the tabs in your Chrome window based on their URL with the press of a button, putting similar tabs next to each other.
